title: To Be a Brave One
overview: This is a story about a young, promising woman An Yu, the chairman of Haowu Group. She had everything a young woman could dream of: a happy family and a career. But a car accident ruined everything. She was in a coma for two years. After coming out of a coma, she found out about the betrayal of a loved one. Recovering from the shock, Han Yu decided to go to work to calm the pain. She accidentally meets Shao Mo Li. After getting acquainted with Han Yu's business and her ideas, the young man decided to help her and jointly engage in this business. After going through all the difficulties, they managed to bring their mutual business to the highest level. Working together helped them not only to get closer, but also to fall in love with each other.
